content: this text is a legal summary of a case that took place in antwerp court the case lasted for a year and three months and involved a dispute between a husband and wife over the dissolution and sale of undivided shares the court found that the husbands claim of aggravation was not admissible and declared his appeal to be unfounded the decision was based on the principles of law outlined in article x of the antwerp law the case was presided over by chairman hs and judge jmw with counsel clb assisting the text also mentions a separate dispute over the division of inheritance involving parties referred to as db registrar n vdv and liquidationdivision the text discusses various points of dispute including overpayments and the transfer of assets and the need for clarification regarding the division of assets and involvement of third parties the text concludes by stating that the appellants claims are unfounded and upholds the judgment of the lower court
